Welcome

An ambitious Company with a Wealth of Experience,Driven by a Desire and Enthusiam to deliver Flexible and Responsible solution for Plastic Packaging.

Privately owned and Independent.Tirupati Polyplast is not part of a huge cartel of packaging providers,Who can often have differing company cultures and priorities.Big enough to deliver.Yet small enough to care.We continue to provide a unified service that confidently meets the demand of all type of customer from large global brands to small Independent.

Our modern site has been installed with latest blow moduling,Injection moduling with capacity comfortability maintain by large accessible open factory units.Used for both manufacturing & storage.

We can produce a range of high quality products, from versatile packaging in HDPE to glass like containers in PEt. In addition to manufacturing, We also offers packaging solutions for bulk products from 7.5L to 210L

Vision

To be our customer first choice when selecng a world class manufacturer and supplier of plasc packaging products delivered with Creavity, Imaginaon and Ingenuity

Mission

To embrace a propensity for sasfying the needs and expectaons of our customers by supplying on-me, high quality products. with compeve pricing and long term consistent value
